channel.title: Secondary functions for weapons
channel.description:
I have read that some of the weapons have been stripped of second functionality, like the Glock for instance.
I just came on the forums so I haven't seen these types of posts but I was wondering if you could add some of these secondary functions for the weapons.
The crow bar can gave a hard swing using when pressing the secondary trigger. - Pros: Powerful - Cons: Has a slow recovery time, I guess recoil? Yes it's lightweight but think about it. Swing a ruler right now, lightly and hardly. Which one hurts more?
I was wondering if the zoom in feature will be available for the .357 Magnum. I just edited the wiki and added that it was an original feature in the trivia section. I wasn't sure if you the team has stripped it and has already made it final which was why I didn't add it in the secondary function. Yes guys, it is in Half life source. Try it now. Magnum zoom rules. :smiley: It is not just in the Deathmatch but also in singleplayer.
The pistol or glock, ..... Gun straightening and centering. [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SM4BiOEOc_w[/url] As seen in this vid. Maybe the magnum can have this? Also the SMG but freaking grenade thing has taken it. -_- """EDIT""" What happens if a post is red. Does that mean it sucks?

item.title: Secondary functions for weapons
item.dc:creator: Phar
item.description:
rorriMAesU:

The only weapons that need the secondary function are the mp5, shotgun, crossbow, rpg, and tau cannon.

The other weapons do not require alternate functions because they are unnecessary.

Doesn’t the .357 also have a secondary zoom feature for Single Player and Multiplayer?

EDIT: I apologize, I thought I was on the last page.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: LimitBreak
item.description:
Ballsopt:

They shot neurotoxin darts ._.

“Did you see it? They said it was hauled in from the Challenger Deep, but I’m positive that beast never swam in terrestrial waters until a week ago! There’s a tranquilizer gun in the shark cage, but I’m not sure if it would work on this species. You’re welcome to try.”

item.title: Secondary functions for weapons
item.dc:creator: m4rek
item.description:
Yeah, they did. Reason: The HL1 crossbow fires tranquiliser darts. HL2 crossbow fires heated rebar. To the best of my knowledge, tranq darts are not known to nail people to walls.

Make sense?
